Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common

Class FunctionalMethods

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.FunctionalMethods
public class FunctionalMethods
extends Object
Methods assisting in functional programming

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static IntPredicate asInt​(Predicate<Integer> predicate)
    Converts the specified Predicate into an IntPredicate.
    static <T> Predicate<T> asObj​(Predicate<T> predicate)
    Simply returns the argument.

  • Method Details

    • asInt

      public static IntPredicate asInt​(Predicate<Integer> predicate)
      Converts the specified Predicate into an IntPredicate. Can be used to force the compiler to interpret a lambda as an IntPredicate rather than a Predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - A Predicate, supposedly in the form of a lambda
      Returns:
      The IntPredicate version of the Predicate

    • asObj

      public static <T> Predicate<T> asObj​(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Simply returns the argument. Can be used to force the compiler to interpret a lambda as a Predicate rather than an IntPredicate.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the argument being tested
      Parameters:
      predicate - A Predicate, supposedly in the form of a lambda
      Returns:
      The argument

    • asOptional

      public static <T,​ R> Function<T,​Optional<R>> asOptional​(Function<? super T,​? extends R> fnc)
      Converts the specified function from one that computes a result into one that computes an Optional of that result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The input type
      R - The return type of specified function and the contents of the Optional.
      Parameters:
      fnc - The function
      Returns:
      A new function that wraps the result of the specified function into an Optional

    • asOptionalInt

      public static <T> Function<T,​OptionalInt> asOptionalInt​(ToIntFunction<? super T> fnc)
      Converts the specified function from one that computes a result into one that computes an OptionalInt of that result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The input type
      Parameters:
      fnc - The function
      Returns:
      A new function that wraps the result of the specified function into an OptionalInt
